title: GET_INTERIOR_ROTATION
content:
0x5A039998// GetInteriorRotation
void GET_INTERIOR_ROTATION(int interiorId, float* rotx, float* rotY, float* rotZ, float* rotW);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.rotx: rotY: rotZ: rotW: Returns: Interior rotation in quaternion.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local x, y, z, w = GetInteriorRotation(interiorId)
  print("current interior " .. interiorId .. " rotation is: " .. vec(x, y, z, w))
end
codeBlocks:
// GetInteriorRotation
void GET_INTERIOR_ROTATION(int interiorId, float* rotx, float* rotY, float* rotZ, float* rotW);

local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local x, y, z, w = GetInteriorRotation(interiorId)
  print("current interior " .. interiorId .. " rotation is: " .. vec(x, y, z, w))
end
